column5: Have tried many things to sit on over the years. none of them really comfortable. Picked up 2 of these this morning. Nice and light, very sturdy and fold up nice and compact  Folding stool  Can't wait to ditch those folding lawn chair. man those are hard on the back.
I think I would have to buy 2, one for each cheek, I think they are made for those of a skinny stature.
I use a folding stool sometimes. Keep in mind that if the snow is deep and/or soft the small legs/feet will sink into the snow.
Not a bad idea, Fang!  I currently use a lightweight folding stool, but it has no back support!  Always something more to buy for the gear pile, isn't there
Do ANY of the CTC stores actually stock 'em? (This should be interestin?')
I just bought 2 of those last week, and they are sweet. THey save SO much room in a two man shelter! And they fold up so thin, I keep them right inside my portable hut when it's folded up!
